author: Soo Kim
title: Global Coronavirus Cases Hit 500,000, Half a Million People Have Now Been Infected With the Virus
description: Italy has the most cases outside China and the highest death toll in the world, while the U.S. reports the second largest number of confirmed infections outside China.
content:
The coronavirus has infected more than half a million people around the world across at least 175 countries. 120,000 people have recovered from infection, according to the latest figures from Johns Hopkins University.
